Case details

This case involves a series of fraudulent transactions conducted online against multiple victims. The suspect allegedly created a fake investment platform claiming high returns on cryptocurrency investments. The total amount defrauded is estimated to be over £25,000 from 12 different victims.

The investigation is currently gathering digital evidence and financial records. Several victims have provided statements, and there is ongoing analysis of the suspect's online activities and banking transactions.

Suspect information

  • Name: Robert Thompson
  • Age: 45
  • Previous offenses: 1 prior conviction for similar offenses in 2018
  • Current status: Under investigation

Investigation timeline

5 April 2023 Additional victims identified

25 April 2023 Financial records requested from suspect's bank
